entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wabush Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -34.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 10:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -34.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -40.1°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 45 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
